characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Your opponent must subtract 1 from hit rolls for ranged weapons that target <HIVE FLEET> units (excluding MONSTERS) within 6" of any friendly <HIVE FLEET> Venomthropes. In adition, your opponent must subtract 1 from hit rolls that target <HIVE FLEET> MONSTERS whilst they are within 6" of any <HIVE FLEET> Venomthrope units that contain 3 or more models. Increase the range of both these effects whilst this unit contains 6 models.
